  • component are building blocks of an angular application
  • At least one root component must be there in the application.
  • The root component attch hirearchy of child component with the dom
  • the component have template and ts class together

    • importing the components in angular module

    import { Component } from '@angular/core';
    • in the above code, we used a typescript module concept for importing module from other modules
    • The Component is a class name from the @angular/core module
    • @angular/core module is the part of the angular framework

    adding metadata to the component

    Component({ selector : 'unique-idefntifier', templateUrl: './temp.template.html', styleUrls: [ './temp/styles.css ' ] })
